author: ClassicAdam
long_description:
This mod just contains a lot of random nodes.  Some of what's included:

* Various colorful blocks

* Mugs, copper and tin

* A plane sphere the size of a block

* Salt and pepper shakers

* Some decorative floor nodes

* Bowls

Hoping to continue adding more on an ongoing basis.

To install, just drop into your Minetest mods folder.

Please enjoy and share!
name: mt_block_and_asset_pack
short_description: Variety of blocks and other mesh nodes.
title: MT Block and Asset Pack
